name: SLYME BREAKER Alpha Demo
description:
Please take the time to fill out our survey after playing our demo!

https://forms.gle/11BGQB28HVwe3e8Y8

SLYME BREAKER is a rude little RPG about a bandit who gets eaten by a slime. Play as Gryme as you bully and pillage your way through a world made entirely of slime. No party members, no EXP--nothing to help you overcome this ordeal but sheer spite. Fight dirty in a cruel and unusual turn-based battle system, where enemies get stronger as you defeat their cohorts and not waiting for your turn to act is the key to victory.

This is our very first public release of SLYME BREAKER. As we are still very early in development, this alpha demo focuses entirely on core gameplay and little else.

CONTROLS:

Z = Select on a menu, Interact in the overworld, Shield and Parry in battle

X = Cancel on a menu, Bash in the overworld, Volley and Counter in battle

Arrow Keys = Move cursor on a menu, move Gryme in the overworld, Snatch in battle
